email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Thomas,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV SEA HORIZON (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 290m) available for your iron ore shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao. The cargo size is 160,000MT on CIF terms. The starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per metric tonne. Laycan is 1-5 April. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for the offer. USD 18.50 seems a bit high given the current market. Can you improve the rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the loading window?

Best regards,
Thomas Reed

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Thomas,

I can offer USD 18.00 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day, pro rata. The loading window is 72 hours. Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

USD 18.00 is better. Can we push it to USD 17.75? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 3-7 April?

Best regards,
Thomas Reed

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Thomas,

USD 17.75 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 3-7 April. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
Thomas Reed

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Thomas,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV SEA HORIZON
- Cargo: 160,000MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Tubarão
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 3-7 April
- Freight: USD 17.75 per metric tonne
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez
